title: Fitzroy: coming up for air
creator_contributor_role: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, production company

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/High-rise apartment buildings
description: An overview of aspects of life in Fitzroy, an inner-city suburb of Melbourne, where there are a large number of Housing Commission high-rise blocks of flats. Residents and people working in the community discuss the quality of life in Fitzroy.
